extension_name.message: Read Aloud: A Text to Speech Voice Reader

extension_description.message: Read out loud the current web-page article with one click. Supports English, Vietnamese, and other languages.

options_rate_explain.message: .5 is half speed, 2 is double speed.

options_spchlet_explain.message: If reading sometimes stops abruptly in the middle of a long sentence, try reducing this number. This setting causes longer sentences to be broken up.
